mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tag (name, create_date, status, user_id, course_id) VALUES (#{name},#{createDate},#{status},#{userId},#{courseId})
mapper.select:
SELECT tt.id,name,tt.create_date as createDate,status,course_id as courseId, (select count(*) from t_question WHERE id in (select question_id from tr_question_tag where tag_id = tt.id)) as questionQty , tu.username as creator FROM t_tag tt JOIN t_user tu on tt.user_id = tu.id
limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
